A weaker version of [[Wind Release: Drilling Air Bullet]], in which after fully possessing [[Gaara]], Shukaku exhales two smaller shots of compressed air mixed with [[chakra]]. He has the ability merge two shots to make a larger and more powerful shot.

[[es:Elemento Viento: Bala Perdigón Perforadora de Aire]]
[[pl:Fūton: Renkūdan Tsubute]]
